items.sentence: Tom can either be your best ally or your worst enemy.
I\'d like to know how long Tom plans to be in Boston.
Tom was about thirty when he started studying French.
We\'ve been studying French for the last three years.
Are you going to ask Mary to go to the prom with you?
I\'m glad I wasn\'t the one who had to tell Tom that.
I don\'t think it\'ll be difficult to for me do that.
Tom was convinced that something was wrong with Mary.
Which weekend in October are you planning to do that?
Would you be able to come back here tomorrow at 2:30?
